In Ukraine's bombarded ports, ship buyers scout for dealsSince Russia invaded Ukraine two years ago, nearly 50 merchant ships have been languishing in its waters, stuck in ports too dangerous to sail from. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 11:50:12 GMT D2NV3SWINVJNZPIS5ZOMI6XVLE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-bombed-ports-ship-buyers-scout-deals-2024-03-15/Jonathan Saul, Carolyn Cohn世界欧洲
Russia systematically tortures Ukraine POWs, UN commission saysA United Nations commission of inquiry on Ukraine said on Friday that it had gathered more evidence that Russia has systematically tortured Ukrainian prisoners of war, documenting rape threats and the use of electric shocks on genitals. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 11:33:03 GMT LI5NM5ZWOFKGTCAQ2LU74HKHSE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-systematically-tortures-ukraine-pows-a-commission-says-2024-03-15/Emma Farge世界欧洲
India dismisses U.S. concern about its citizenship law as 'misplaced'Comments by the United States expressing concern about India's implementation of a contentious citizenship law based on religion are "misplaced, misinformed, and unwarranted", the foreign ministry of the South Asian nation said on Friday. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 11:26:03 GMT YQUQ​​RLKYWJP4LAZA6TUXUXUZ4M https://www.reuters.com/world/india/india-dismisses-us-concern-about-its-citizenship-law-misplaced-2024-03-15/Reuters世界印度
Aid ship reaches Gaza coast; Israel rejects Hamas truce offerThe first ship carrying food aid reached the coast of the Gaza Strip on Friday, where hopes for a ceasefire to rescue the population from starvation suffered a new blow after Israel rejected the latest truce counter-proposal from Hamas. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 11:18:56 GMT AXQ62PNJRNKU5JN4WUH4RI7CBU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/aid-ship-reaches-gaza-coast-israel-rejects-hamas-truce-offer-2024-03-15/Bassam Masoud, Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Samia Nakhoul世界中东地区
Russian missile attack kills two in Ukraine's Odesa, governor saysA Russian missile attack on Ukraine's southern city of Odesa on Friday killed at least two people and wounded others, the regional governor said. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 11:18:17 GMT 45RGOX63VBPQDJXGV2KVD7TJFU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-missile-attack-kills-two-ukraine-odessa-governor-says-2024-03-15/Reuters世界欧洲
Finland moves to block asylum seekers from entering via RussiaFinland plans to adopt temporary legislation that will allow its border authorities to block asylum seekers seeking to enter its territory from Russia, the government said on Friday. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 11:02:59 GMT 6RJFCCSZVRIHFKX6X2UBRHO33Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/finland-could-block-asylum-seekers-entering-via-Russia-2024-03-15/Essi Lehto世界欧洲
Russia launches criminal case against woman who poured liquid into ballot boxRussian state investigators in Moscow said on Friday they had opened a criminal case against a woman who poured liquid into a ballot box. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 10:54:08 GMT 2QFVQ43FCRIYVPMB5IPEZKBBLM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-launches-criminal-case-against-woman-who-poured-liquid-into-ballot-box-2024-03-15/Reuters世界欧洲
India minister says party funding system needs transparencyIndian Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said on Friday a political funding mechanism scrapped by the Supreme Court as "unconstitutional" was an improvement on the past but a more transparent system should be put in place. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 10:31:39 GMT 5REFRCNGQJIRNGGKSFHWQQQZCQ https://www.reuters.com/world/india/india-minister-says-party-funding-system-needs-transparency-2024-03-15/Rajesh Prabhuswamy世界印度
Pope Francis reflects on his life and mortality in memoirPope Francis, at 87 increasingly weak and wobbly, takes a trip down memory lane and speaks of his hopes for the Roman Catholic Church's future in a new book reflecting on his life and its intersection with major world events. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 10:31:24 GMT QN3MWEWTMNL6FHJOHTQSN2V57M https://www.reuters.com/world/pope-francis-reflects-his-life-mortality-memoir-2024-03-15/Philip Pullella世界
Kremlin says U.S. is conducting a covert influence campaign against RussiaThe Kremlin on Friday said that the United States has been trying to conduct a covert influence campaign against the Russian authorities, but that Moscow's security services had taken action to minimise its impact. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 10:27:52 GMT CJELN4AA7VPVPOFMC3F3MJW3F4 https://www.reuters.com/world/kremlin-says-us-is-conducting-covert-influence-campaign-against-Russia-2024-03-15/Reuters世界
US lawmakers blocking critical funding for Haiti multinational missionU.S. lawmakers are refusing to release millions of dollars in funding that Washington views as critical to help tackle spiraling violence in Haiti, in another potential stumbling block for the international force. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 10:03:04 GMT EGMSNG33LBKG3L7XORGI2A2OXE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/us-lawmakers-blocking-ritic-funding-haiti-multinational-mission-2024-03-15/Daphne Psaledakis, Patricia Zengerle世界美洲
